CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the trust type based on whether the trust grantor (creator) is the same or different from the trustee or if the grantor is deceased.
CustomField.label: Trust Type

value.fullName: Declaration of trust (grantor and trustee same)
value.label: Declaration of trust (grantor and trustee same)

value.fullName: Trust under agreement (grantor and trustee different)
value.label: Trust under agreement (grantor and trustee different)

value.fullName: Testamentary trust (under will of deceased grantor)
value.label: Testamentary trust (under will of deceased grantor)
